text: "Moonage Daydream" is a song by English singer-songwriter David Bowie. It is the third track from his 1972 album The Rise and Fall of Ziggy Stardust and the Spiders from Mars. It was produced by Ken Scott. The song lyrics talks about the Moon and outer space. MGMT covered it on The Dr Oz Show On January 20, 2014 Category:1971 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:David Bowie songs Category:Glam rock songs Category:MGMT songs
title: Moonage Daydream
